title: How to Play Kims Game

steps.headline: Collect about 20 small, memorable or obscure, items.
steps.description:
Good ones are:
Nail varnish bottle (a.k.a. nail polish)
Tiny teddies
Pencils
Plastic jewellery
Small value coins
Fake bugs, beetles, spiders etc. Purses

steps.headline: Place your objects around a tray.
steps.description: They should all be visible from a few feet away on either side.

steps.headline: Tell people to look at the items.
steps.description: Set a time limit - say, a minute.

steps.headline: Have the players review the items for that them period.
steps.description: Then put a sheet over the tray so the items are not visible.

steps.headline: Give each player a piece of paper and a pen/pencil.
steps.description: Tell them to write down everything from the tray that they can remember.

steps.headline: Declare a winner.
steps.description: The person who remembers the most wins and gets something of their choice from the tray.

text:
Collect about 20 small, memorable or obscure, items. Good ones are:
Nail varnish bottle (a.k.a. nail polish)
Tiny teddies
Pencils
Plastic jewellery
Small value coins
Fake bugs, beetles, spiders etc. Purses Place your objects around a tray. They should all be visible from a few feet away on either side. Tell people to look at the items. Set a time limit - say, a minute. Have the players review the items for that them period. Then put a sheet over the tray so the items are not visible. Give each player a piece of paper and a pen/pencil. Tell them to write down everything from the tray that they can remember. Declare a winner. The person who remembers the most wins and gets something of their choice from the tray.
